text: I cane to Jurong East branch on 8th May at around 3.15pm to do a FD deposit served by a female lady staff of counter 2. Her efficiency and caring for the clients is of excellent performance. She managed to process my FD in a very short period of time in order to meet the cut off time of clearing. Strongly recommend a compliment and keep up in her good work.

Greeted us while seated. Waited from 10am till 12.37pm. Just to settle an account and claim a cheque. Front desk approach counter for help. Pushed back to front counter. Ours was resolved when everybody else has left. Glad we closed account here.

I don‚Äôt normally post any reviews but today visit at RHB bank is a wonderful experience for me. Edmund Ong has been very helpful and professional in helping me open up a FD account. He guided me step by step and the whole process has been quick and thorough. I would like to give him a thumb up for the good job and hope he will continue such good work and get recognised.üëçüëçüëç
Poor and rude customer service .  When will there ever be a bank that cares a little for customers?
I like this bank because I don't need to wait for hours for my banking needs. Service is good
